issue.title: [Java][Integration] Enable custom_metadata integration test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8114](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8114). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will require refactoring the way metadata is serialized to JSON following https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6556 (needs to be `[{key: "$key", value: "$value"}]`, rather than ` {"$key": "$value"} `

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8114?focusedCommentId=17118795) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7269
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7269>
